div.bibl: Svenska Tribunen, Nov. 9, 1892. THE SWEDISH JOURNALISTS OF CHICAGO

body.p: The Swedish-American Publicists club of Chicago hold its regular meeting last Saturday in the Sherman House. A motion was carried to have the by-laws changed to read that the officers of the club should be elected for terms of six instead of twelve months. In accordance with this decision, an election of officers was held, resulting as follows; P. A. Sundelius, pres.; Alex, J. Johnson, 1st. vice-pres.; Algot E. Strand, 2nd. vice-pres.; F. A. Lindstrand, 3rd. vice-pres.; Nils Mannow, secretary, and A. Chaiser, treasurer.
